record.title: MORNING BUSINESS

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent we now proceed to a period of morning business for 1 hour with Senators being allowed to speak therein for a period up to 10 minutes each.

I tell all Members the reason for this is we are going to move to the budget, appointing of conferees, with Senator Conrad and Senator JUDD GREGG having some issues they need to work out prior to that. I think it would be in the best interests of us all if that consent agreement were confirmed.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I would amend that to have the time equally divided between the majority and minority.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
